verses.verse: A prayer <WH8605> of Habakkuk, <WH2265> the prophet, <WH5030> set to victorious music. <WH7692>

Yahweh, <WH3068> I have heard <WH8085> of your fame. <WH8088> I stand in awe of your deeds, <WH6467> Yahweh. <WH3068> Renew your work <WH6467> in the midst <WH7130> of the years. <WH8141> In the midst <WH7130> of the years <WH8141> make it known. <WH3045> In wrath, <WH7267> you remember <WH2142> mercy. <WH7355>

God <WH433> came <WH935> from Teman, <WH8487> the Holy One <WH6918> from Mount <WH2022> Paran. <WH6290> Selah. <WH5542> His glory <WH1935> covered <WH3680> the heavens, <WH8064> and his praise <WH8416> filled <WH4390> the earth. <WH776>
His splendor <WH5051> is like the sunrise. <WH216> Rays <WH7161> shine <WH216> from his hand, <WH3027> where his power <WH5797> is hidden. <WH2253>
Plague <WH1698> went <WH3212> before <WH6440> him, <WH7565> and pestilence followed <WH3318> his feet. <WH7272>

He stood, <WH5975> and shook <WH4128> the earth. <WH776> He looked, <WH7200> and made the nations <WH1471> tremble. <WH5425> The ancient <WH5703> mountains <WH2042> were crumbled. <WH6327> The age-old <WH5769> hills <WH1389> collapsed. <WH7817> His ways <WH1979> are eternal. <WH5769>
I saw <WH7200> the tents <WH168> of Cushan <WH3572> in affliction. <WH205> The dwellings <WH3407> of the land <WH776> of Midian <WH4080> trembled. <WH7264>

Was Yahweh <WH3068> displeased <WH2734> with the rivers? <WH5104> Was your anger <WH639> against the rivers, <WH5104> or your wrath <WH5678> against the sea, <WH3220> that you rode <WH7392> on your horses, <WH5483> on your chariots <WH4818> of salvation? <WH3444>
You <WH6181> uncovered <WH5783> your bow. <WH7198> You called for your <WH4294> sworn <WH7621> arrows. <WH562> Selah. <WH5542> You split <WH1234> the earth <WH776> with rivers. <WH5104>

The mountains <WH2022> saw <WH7200> you, <WH2342> and were afraid. The storm <WH2230> of waters <WH4325> passed by. <WH5674> The deep <WH8415> roared <WH5414> <WH6963> and lifted up <WH5375> its hands <WH3027> on high. <WH7315>

The sun <WH8121> and moon <WH3394> stood still <WH5975> in the sky, <WH2073> at the light <WH216> of your arrows <WH2671> as they went, <WH1980> at the shining <WH5051> of your glittering <WH1300> spear. <WH2595>
You marched through <WH6805> the land <WH776> in wrath. <WH2195> You threshed <WH1758> the nations <WH1471> in anger. <WH639>

You went forth <WH3318> for the salvation <WH3468> of your people, <WH5971> for the salvation <WH3468> of your anointed. <WH4899> You crushed <WH4272> the head <WH7218> of the land <WH1004> of wickedness. <WH7563> You stripped <WH6168> them head <WH6677> to foot. <WH3247> Selah. <WH5542>

You pierced <WH5344> the heads <WH7218> of his warriors <WH6518> with their own spears. <WH4294> They came as a whirlwind <WH5590> to scatter <WH6327> me, <WH5951> gloating as if to devour <WH398> the wretched <WH6041> in secret. <WH4565>
You trampled <WH1869> the sea <WH3220> with your horses, <WH5483> churning <WH2563> mighty <WH7227> waters. <WH4325>

I heard, <WH8085> and my body <WH990> trembled. <WH7264> My lips <WH8193> quivered <WH6750> at the voice. <WH6963> Rottenness <WH7538> enters <WH935> into my bones, <WH6106> and I tremble <WH7264> in my place, <WH5117> because I must wait quietly for the day <WH3117> of trouble, <WH6869> for the coming up <WH5927> of the people <WH5971> who invade us. <WH1464>

For though the fig tree <WH8384> doesn't <WH6524> flourish, nor fruit <WH2981> be in the vines; <WH1612> the labor <WH4639> of the olive <WH2132> fails, <WH3584> the fields <WH7709> yield <WH6213> no food; <WH400> the flocks <WH6629> are cut off <WH1504> from the fold, <WH4356> and there is no herd <WH1241> in the stalls: <WH7517>
yet I will rejoice <WH5937> in Yahweh. <WH3068> I will be joyful <WH1523> in the God <WH430> of my salvation! <WH3468>

Yahweh, <WH3069> the Lord, <WH136> is my strength. <WH2428> He makes <WH7760> my feet <WH7272> like deer <WH355>'s feet, <WH1869> and enables me to go in high places. <WH1116> For the music director, <WH5329> on my stringed instruments. <WH5058>
